lines: Hey. Hello. I’m {Detective Raede}[Person, Detective Raede], call me… uh… nevermind. Tough situation you’re in, huh. I’m not gonna pretend I understand how you feel. I don’t. But things are not as they seem.
I can’t go into the details right now, but I’m working on a solution. For now, let’s just say I’m working on a case, and my only witness is… unresponsive.
Enough about me. How are you feeling? Good?

The detective’s face lightens up a little.
Oh, great! I hope I can count on you, then.

A sudden sadness overwhelms you. Is this your life now? The detective sighs.

I… I see. I’m so sorry. I hope… ah, if only things went differently, but there’s no turning back now.
Don’t worry. There’s no need for you to hide it. I understand. I give you my word, I will not leave you alone.
Totally unresponsive, huh. This is not a great start. Not great at all. I hope you can understand what I’m getting at here.

I know you’re going through a lot, but I’m gonna need you to do something for me, alright? From now on, people will start coming to see you. You might know them, you might not. I need you to do your utmost to remember as many details as possible about them. Believe me, together, we can find a way out of this. Never lose {hope}[feeling, Hope]. We will meet again.
The detective leaves, closing the door behind him. Even if you remember things, how are you supposed to tell him?
